metadata.title: CVE-2022-43593 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the DPXOutput::close()functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.4.2. A speciallycrafted ImageOutput Object can lead to null pointer dereference. Anattacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
